original: Holst, Erik Gustav, rådman, Vänersborg, f. 4/9/13 i Sthlm av landsfisk. Erik H. o, Julia Sigmer. G. 45 m. Karin Walander. Barn: Thomas f. 46. — Stud:ex. i Uddevalla 32, jur. kand. i Upps. 38. Not:tjg. i ol. doms. 38-41, fiskal i Göta hoYv. 42-46, därav m. tjg. s. tf. ass’ess. i rådhusr. i Norrköp. 44-46, andre lagfar, rådman v. rådhusr. i Vänersb., tillika stadsfogde fr. 47.
translated: Holst, Erik Gustav, councilman, Vänersborg, born on September 4th, 1913 in Stockholm to rural district fisherman Erik H. and Julia Sigmer. Married in 1945 to Karin Walander. Children: Thomas (born in 1946). Studied high school in Uddevalla in 1932 and law in Uppsala in 1938. Worked as a temporary notary in the old court of appeals from 1938 to 1941 and as a deputy judge in Göta Court of Appeal from 1942 to 1946, including serving as a temporary assistant judge in Norrköping city court in 1944-1946. He later became the second judge and councilman of Vänersborg city court, also serving as the city sheriff from 1947.
